descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuation of (330-1) groups and their structure; ring theory; polynomial rings. Students may not receive credit for corresponding quarters of both 330 and 331. Prerequisite: 240 or consent of instructor.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0201763904 A First Course in Abstract Algebra, 7th ed
John Fraleigh
Pearson
